department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: 本課程的目標主要包含: 了解數位語言學習系統研究領域的發展, 探討數位語言學習系統的相關設計原則, 並實際開發一個數位語言學習系統.
goal.en: The objectives of this course are to introduce the development of the field of Technology Enhanced Language Learning, to discuss the design principle of Technology Enhanced Language Learning, and to implement a Technology Enhanced Language Learning system.

outline.ch: 本課程授課方式包含: 講課, 小組討論, 小組簡報(期末專題提案, 系統分析, 及期末系統展示)等.
outline.en: The course includes: Lecture, Group discussion, and Group presentations (group project proposal, system exploration, group project final presentations).

ch.competencies: 認識數位學習之發展歷史與趨勢
培養數位學習之理論素養
培養數位學習所需之科技能力
培養數位學習研究方法與推廣應用之能力
培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
培養具國際觀之跨領域人才

en.competencies: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning.
Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning.
Develop the needed technological ability of network learning.
Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to  promote and put network learning in use.
Develop the ability to coordinate and make innovative design.
Develop multi-disciplined  talents with international perspective.
